meanings.sent1: The resiny sap dripped slowly from the pine tree.
meanings.sent2: The guitar had a resiny smell from the varnish used on it.
meanings.sent3: The resiny texture of the glue made it stick to everything!
meanings.sent4: The air was filled with a resiny scent after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The resiny surface of the table gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The resiny surface of the painting gave it a glossy finish.
meanings.sent2: The resiny pinecones glistened in the morning dew.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally touched the resiny handle and got sticky fingers.
meanings.sent4: The resiny coating on the floor made it slippery to walk on.
meanings.sent5: The resiny film on the window distorted the view outside.

meanings.sent1: The resiny texture of the fabric made it waterproof.
meanings.sent2: The resiny taste of the honey reminded her of the forest.
meanings.sent3: The resiny feel of the soap made it hard to wash off.
meanings.sent4: His resiny voice was deep and soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The resiny nature of the material made it durable and long-lasting.
